attributes.action: We, the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to build a village for u.k. soldiers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we petition p.m. to  build a village which would include a local hospital’ for our soldiers and there family’s and home from homes so that there family’s can be near there loved ones .The village would serve all our armed forces and there family’s. Our military units is too small for the numbers of battlefield casualties, and the overflow has had to be treated on ordinary mixed NHS wards which is not suitable for our armed forces .Armed forces  have a language &  of their own and a totally different  perspective on life;  it is bad enough that  relatives have to travel from all over the country , to visit wounded personnel and there should be a village where by our soldiers and there familys  can be near each other Please give our armed forces the consideration and respect you expect people to give you. Help to build their morale through knowing that we, the British public, do care about their wellbeing
